title: W101 Central
content:
Simply put, I have used the website:

http://www.wizard101central.com/

For MANY years, and now your system wont let it load. I have spent over an hour going through the endless links in your "help" system with no help at all.

This site is not loading and the lock with the red line wont let me disable the darn thing.

If I have to choose between Firefox and being able to access what sites I want, then Firefox will lose the battle.

I have tried all your little "help" suggestions and none work. I have been a faithful Firefox customer for about 12 years, but the end of that era is quickly coming to a close.

For your sake, I hope this is something you can fix easily because that website has thousands of loyal customers that are having the same issue with you that I am now.
creator: vanshipley

title: Firefox crashes when printing to "Save to PDF"
content:
OS: Windows 10 Firefox Version 100.0 Starting this afternoon...

Firefox crashes (completely shuts down) every time I try to print to "Save to PDF" with the Firefox browser page open. I can print a browser page to my local printer, but not to "Save to PDF", even if it is in Troubleshoot Mode and even after Firefox has been refreshed.

Everything on my system is current and updated.

This issue is new.

Any ideas, or other suggestions.

Thank you in advance for your time and assistance on this matter.

Dave
creator: davesorion

title: ABC (Australia) https://iview.abc.net.au/ No longer plays. It does on other browsers
content: ABC (Australia) https://iview.abc.net.au/ No longer plays video. It does on other browsers. I've followed FF advice ive come across by disabeling extentions/add ons, restarted FF but no luck. Also, I've started in safe mode. Also no luck.

title: I can not write in the inputs of a web page made by me
content:
I was using firefox to test my site and suddenly it won't let me write in the contact input, I tried with other browsers and if it lets me and I don't know what the problem is.

Estaba usando firefox para probar mi sitio y de repente no me deja escribir en los input de contacto, probe con otros navegadores y si me deja y no se cual es el problema
creator: juakobazan27

title: Picture-in-picture
content: I would like to enable picture-in-picture without constantly having a popup for it anytime my cursor goes onto the video screen. You could just put a button somewhere out of the way. It's so annoying I have to just disable it, and that's not right. Nobody needs popups of any kind for anything ever. It's the same as an ad.
creator: 36m2jones

title: syncing bookmarks, keywords etc. between old and new laptops
content: I am trying to transfer my bookmarks, open tabs and passwords etc. from my old laptop to my new one. It appears I have to do this with Firefox Sync under the preferences menu. However when I try to connect a new device, I am told to open the code scanner on my Firefox App, which sounds like I have to use a mobile? How do I scan the QR code using my new laptop?
creator: e.gillam

title: Does Firefox has an option like --app from google-chrome?
content:
I use google-chrome with the --app option extensively in scripts on my Linux systems. Does Firefox has such a similar option?

As a basic example: /opt/google/chrome/google-chrome --app=https://docs.google.com/

Thanks
creator: bernard.fay

title: On my Windows 10 machine Firefox cannot print pages where images overflow pages.
content:
Various online booking sites will format blocks of key information as large images and Firefox* never prints such pages correctly. The problem seems to occur when an image is split between one page and the next. I've attached two small images of the top of the page as displayed in Firefox and the print preview for that page. The page has two buttons ("Map It" and "add to Apple Wallet") that are forced off of page one but do not appear on page two. Page two prints as shown -- blank with only header and footer lines -- and the information that should be on page two (including any text) is omitted. I've had the same issue for several years. This includes several Firefox versions, several printer manufacturers (Cannon, Epsom, and HP), and a number of OS updates. I am absurdly loyal to Firefox (dunno why) but I keep having to switch to Edge whenever I need to print a complex web page. I keep hoping that the problem will be fixed.

  • Name Firefox

Version 99.0.1 Build ID 20220411174855 Running on Windows 10 print_printer Canon G3060 series Update Channel release User Agent Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:99.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/99.0 OS Windows_NT 10.0 19043
creator: bigleehimself
